EmailTemplate.name: TriCON 2012.Join the Fun
EmailTemplate.subject: TriCON - Join the fun in the San Diego sun
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.tritech.com/tricon>
Come to TriCON and meet like-minded individuals who share the same technology and experiences. TriCON provides fun social networking opportunities to establish valuable connections with peers, TriTech staff and vendors - all in America’s Finest City. Bring your business cards and a great attitude for a week of fun. And if you register by July 15, you'll get our best prices too!
<http://www.tritech.com/tricon>
<http://www.facebook.com/pages/TriCON/217186504986544> <http://www.twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/company/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware>
9477 Waples Street, Suite 100 l San Diego, California 92121 l www.tritech.com
